history.proof: intros d a0 a1 s sigma. intros Hcorr Hunion. unfold union_0 in Hunion. unfold union_opt_state in Hunion. remember (MapGet state d (uad_conv_0 a0)) as o0 eqn:Heqo0. remember (MapGet state d (uad_conv_1 a1)) as o1 eqn:Heqo1. destruct o0 as [s0|]; destruct o1 as [s1|]. - inversion Hunion; subst. eapply union_mpl_correct_wrt_sign_invar; eapply Hcorr; eauto. - hauto l: on depth: 3. - hauto l: on depth: 3. - congruence.

ctx: intros d a0 a1 s sigma.

remember (MapGet state d (uad_conv_1 a1)) as o1 eqn:Heqo1.
destruct o0 as [s0|]; destruct o1 as [s1|].

original: intros d a0 a1 s sigma. intros Hcorr Hunion. unfold union_0 in Hunion. unfold union_opt_state in Hunion. remember (MapGet state d (uad_conv_0 a0)) as o0 eqn:Heqo0. remember (MapGet state d (uad_conv_1 a1)) as o1 eqn:Heqo1. destruct o0 as [s0|]; destruct o1 as [s1|]. - inversion Hunion; subst. eapply union_mpl_correct_wrt_sign_invar; eapply Hcorr; eauto. - simpl in Hunion. congruence. - simpl in Hunion. congruence. - simpl in Hunion. congruence.
